#summary How to export correctly Skin.
#labels Tutorial,3dsMax,Export,Featured

=== Convert to Editable Mesh object ===

http://sea3d.googlecode.com/svn/tags/skin-0.jpg

To preserve the changes of the mesh and optimize the export is necessary convert the model to Editable Mesh.

[Tips_3dsMax_ConvertMesh]

=== Not repeat bone name ===

http://sea3d.googlecode.com/svn/tags/skin-1.jpg

Do not repeat the same name for the bones. For handling of the bones in the engine they should be independent names.

=== Do not create redundant envelopes ===

Share the vertices of the mesh only with parent or child bones.
